transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Good evening, ma'am.
Customer: Good evening, kahan se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ma'am, main aap IndiaMART se hi to baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To ma'am, mujhe main Sriji Traders ke naam se meri IndiaMART pe profile hai.
Customer: Kis naam se?
Executive: Sriji Traders.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: To ma'am mujhe doubt hai, wo mujhe clear karna hai aur mujhe karna hai to karna hai bas. Mujhe ye bataiye aap, maine jo lead maangi thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo lead hoti hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Yearly wali lead.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To mere tak yearly service le rakhi hai aapne?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Nahi, yearly service li hai maine.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Samajh gayi na aap? IndiaMART se hi to baat kar rahi hai aap, unknown ban ke kyun baat kar rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, haan sir boliye, samajh gayi main. Sriji Traders se aap baat kar rahe hain, kal aapki service, haan.
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Haan, to mujhe ye bata dijiye aap ke meri baat hui thi Rohit Dubey ji se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To unhone ye bola tha haan main 50 lead dilwaunga yearly mein.
Executive: Ek to milti hai weekly, ek milti hai yearly. Yearly mein mujhe 10 lead mili hai aur hai na 50 nahi mili. Unhone bola tha 50 include karwaunga.
Customer: Unhone aapko ye cheez written mein di thi?
Customer: Haan, boli thi unhone written mein.
Customer: Written mein, written mein sir, bolne ka kya bol to koi kuch bhi deta hai.
Customer: Haan, haan ma'am mere paas aap batao kya proof logi? Chatting ka screen proof.
Executive: Haan, to aap ye mera WhatsApp number hai, aap isme jo hai bhejiye lead aur baki hum aapse kal connect karenge iske regarding.
Executive: Haan, to ma'am mujhe hai na wo karwani hai kyunki mere ek do dost hai unka bhi hai na usme hi tha. Unko bhi lead mili hai aise yearly mein 50 lead extra hai to wo mujhe chahiye hi chahiye. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan to sir aapke paas written hoga to aapko bilkul milegi agar unhone aisa bola hai to.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Haan unhone aapko written mein diya hoga to aap wo proof mujhe aap WhatsApp kar dijiyega baki kal subah 9:00 baje main aapse connect karti hu.
Executive: Aur sir office timing 9:00 to 6:00 hai, okay?
Executive: 9:00 to 6:00, theek hai, theek hai. Ji, thank you ma'am.
Customer: Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received 50 yearly leads.

Resolution:

- Asked customer to share written proof on WhatsApp.
- Executive will connect next day at 9:00 AM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, yearly, whatsapp, proof

seller_categories.mcat_name: Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
